name: Young Blue Dragon
senses: Blindsight 30 ft., Darkvision 120 ft.,  Passive Perception 19

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The dragon makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 16 (2d10 + 5) piercing damage plus 5 (1d10) lightning damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (2d6 + 5) slashing damage.

actions.name: Lightning Breath
actions.description: The dragon exhales lightning in an 60-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a DC 16 Dexterity saving throw, taking 55 (10d10) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
